title: How Do You Make the Perfect Toy? | The Walrus
excerpt: Fads come and go, but how to create a toy that stands the test of time is the billion-dollar question

title: 10 Tips for Cultivating Creativity, From the Director of the Lifelong Kindergarten Group at MIT
excerpt: The challenge is not how to “teach creativity” to children, but rather how to create a fertile environment in which their creativity will take root, grow, and flourish.
